Oh great, now the waste report is going to get a subpoena from the Special Prosecutor.
We spent over $170k to build trails in national parks. Seems like not too bad until you read the next line that the parks were in Russia
It may not seem like a lot of money, but we spent just under $100k to make sure Kenyan farmers knew how to use Facebook.
They spent $324,015 to pay for a clown school in Argentina. Rumors to the contrary, this was not a CODEL
Your government spent $3,217,960 on putting on music festival and concerts abroad.
Here are just a handful of the examples...#AiringofGrievances
That’s roughly the size of my hometown of Bowling Green, Kentucky
The average taxpayer pays around $8,136. That means the programs in this report wasted the taxes of 69,250 people
My #Festivus edition of the Waste Report totals $563,421,523 the federal government wasted.
I’m back to celebrate #Festivus with some more #AiringofGrievances, this time about how the government spends your money
